name: Aerodactyl
AbilityText: Any damage done to Aerodactyl by attacks from your opponent's Pokemon is reduced by 10 for each React Energy card attached to Aerodactyl (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Aerodactyl.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects, including damage, done to Aerodactyl by attacks from your opponent's Pokemon-ex.

name: Aggron
Attack1Text: Does 70 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Aggron. If Aggron has any React Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 70 damage instead.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 60 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) During your next turn, Aggron can't use Bound Crush.

name: Cradily
Attack1Text: Count the number of React Energy cards attached to Cradily and choose up to that number of your opponent's Evolved Pokemon. Remove the highest Stage Evolution card from each of those Pokemon, then have your opponent shuffle those cards into his or her deck.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Delcatty
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a React Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokemon to another of your Pokemon. This power can't be used if Delcatty is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for an Energy card and attach it to Delcatty.

name: Gengar
AbilityText: If Gengar would be Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, you may put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Put 2 damage counters on your opponent's Pokemon in any way you like. If Gengar has any React Energy cards attached to it, put 4 damage counters instead.

name: Golem
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a Fighting Energy card and attach it to Golem. If you do, remove 2 damage counters from Golem.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage for each damage counter on Golem to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Kabutops
AbilityText: As long as you have Omanyte or Omastar in play, damage done to Kabutops by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to Kabutops.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Pokemon-ex, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Lapras
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Lapras onto your Bench from your hand, you may search your deck for a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Machamp
Attack1Text: Discard a Special Energy card, if any, attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 60 damage plus 20 damage for each React Energy card attached to Machamp.

name: Mew
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon. Mew is the same type as that Pokemon (all if that Pokemon is more than 1 type) until the end of your turn. This power can't be used if Mew is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If Mew and the Defending Pokemon have a different amount of Energy attached to them, this attack's base damage is 20 instead of 50.

name: Muk
AbilityText: As long as Muk is your Active Pokemon, each player's Pokemon can't use any Poke-Powers.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Shiftry
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you play Shiftry from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may choose 1 of your Evolved Pokemon in play (excluding any Shiftry). Return that Pokemon and all cards attached to it to your hand.
Attack1Text: If Shiftry has any React Energy cards attached to it, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is an Evolved Pokemon, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Victreebel
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Stage 2 Evolved Pokemon with 1 of the Defending Pokemon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokemon to switch. This power can't be used if Victreebel is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep and Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Wailord
AbilityText: As long as Wailord has any React Energy cards attached to it, the Retreat Cost for each of your Water Pokemon (excluding Pokemon-ex) is 0.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your Benched Stage 1 Evolved Pokemon.

name: Absol
AbilityText: As long as Absol is the only Pokemon you have in play, your opponent's Basic Pokemon can't attack.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Pokemon-ex, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokemon.

name: Girafarig
AbilityText: Each player's Active Basic Pokemon (excluding Pokemon-ex) can't use any Poke-Powers.
Attack1Text: Look at the top 5 cards on either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order you like.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Special Energy cards attached to it, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Gorebyss
AbilityText: Each React Energy card attached to all of your Huntail and Gorebyss provides 2 Energy of every type but has no effect other than providing Energy.
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Gorebyss but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 40 damage in this way.

name: Huntail
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Huntail has no React Energy cards attached to it, you may search your deck for a React Energy card and attach it to Huntail. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Huntail is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Pokemon-ex, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Lanturn
AbilityText: As long as Lanturn has any Water Energy attached to it, Lanturn is both Water and Lightning type.
Attack2Text: Does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Lanturn but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more then 40 damage in this way.

name: Lunatone
AbilityText: As long as you have Solrock in play, each player's Fire Pokemon (excluding Pokemon-ex) can't use any Poke-Powers.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Trainer card (excluding Supporter cards), show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Magmar
AbilityText: As long as Magmar is an Evolved Pokemon, all Energy attached to Magmar are Fire Energy instead of their usual types.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Magneton
AbilityText: If Magneton would be Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, you may move any number of React Energy cards from Magneton to your Pokemon in any way you like.
Attack1Text: If Magneton has any React Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Magnemite and Magneton (both yours and your opponent's) in play.

name: Omastar
AbilityText: As long as you have Kabuto, Kabutops, or Kabutops ex in play, Omastar's attacks do 20 more damage to the Defending Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Before doing damage, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and switch it with 1 of the Defending Pokemon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokemon to switch.

name: Pinsir
AbilityText: As long as Pinsir is the only Pokemon you have in play, your opponent's Basic Pokemon can't attack.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Grass Pokemon (excluding Pokemon-ex), show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Solrock
AbilityText: As long as you have Lunatone in play, each player's Colorless Pokemon (excluding Pokemon-ex) can't use any Poke-Powers.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Lunatone and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Spinda
AbilityText: As long as Spinda is your Active Pokemon, whenever your opponent's Basic Pokemon tries to attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing. You can't use more than 1 Pattern Distraction Poke-Body each turn.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, draw 2 cards.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Spinda does 10 damage to itself.

name: Torkoal
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Fire Pokemon (excluding Pokemon-ex), show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Torkoal.

name: Wobbuffet
AbilityText: As long as Wobbuffet is an Evolved Pokemon, your opponent pays Colorless more to retreat his or her Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Wobbuffet.
Attack2Text: Put 7 damage counters on the Defending Pokemon at the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Anorith
Attack1Text: Search your deck for Omanyte, Kabuto, Aerodactyl, Lileep, or Anorith and put up to 2 of them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. Treat the new Benched Pokemon as Basic Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If Anorith has any React Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Cascoon
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Cascoon is your Active Pokemon, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card that evolves from Cascoon and put it onto Cascoon. (This counts as evolving Cascoon.) Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Cascoon is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Dunsparce
AbilityText: As long as Dunsparce is your Active Pokemon, your opponent's Dunsparce can't attack.
Attack1Text: Draw 2 cards from the bottom of your deck.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused. You may switch Dunsparce with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Electrode
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Furret
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more for each of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Graveler
AbilityText: Any damage done to Graveler by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon (1 if there is only 1). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Haunter
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Evolved Pokemon in play, choose 1 of them and flip a coin. If heads, remove the highest Stage Evolution card on that Pokemon and have your opponent shuffle it into his or her deck.
Attack2Text: Put 2 damage counters on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Kabuto
AbilityText: Each of your Omanyte, Omastar, Kabuto, Kabutops, and Kabutops ex has no Weakness.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Kabuto by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Kecleon
AbilityText: If Kecleon has any React Energy cards attached to it, Kecleon is Grass, Fire, Water, Lightning, Psychic, and Fighting type.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Lairon
Attack1Text: Remove all Special Conditions and 5 damage counters (all if there are less than 5) from Lairon. Lairon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Machoke
AbilityText: As long as Machoke is Confused, Machoke's attacks do 50 more damage to the Defending Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to each Defending Pokemon.

name: Misdreavus
AbilityText: As long as Misdreavus is your Active Pokemon, each player flips 2 coins for his or her Pokemon that is Asleep between turns. If either coin is tails, that Pokemon is still Asleep.
Attack1Text: Return an Energy card attached to Misdreavus to your hand. The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is not Asleep, this attack does nothing.

name: Nuzleaf
Attack2Text: Before doing damage, discard all Trainer cards attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Roselia
AbilityText: As long as Roselia has any React Energy cards attached to it, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokemon (excluding Pokemon-ex) that has any React Energy cards attached to it between turns. You can't use more than 1 Reactive Aroma Poke-Body each turn.
Attack1Text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with 1 of the Defending Pokemon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokemon to switch. The new Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Sealeo
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck. If you do, put 1 damage counter on Sealeo. This power can't be used if Sealeo is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Tangela
AbilityText: Whenever you attach a React Energy card from your hand to Tangela, remove all damage counters from Tangela.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is a Basic Pokemon, that Pokemon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Tentacruel
AbilityText: As long as Tentacruel has any React Energy cards attached to it, prevent all effects, including damage, done to any of your Tentacruel in play by attacks from your opponent's Pokemon-ex.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Vibrava
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: If Vibrava has any React Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Weepinbell
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Aron
Attack1Text: Attach a Metal Energy card from your hand to Aron.

name: Bellsprout
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Chinchou
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Clamperl
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Clamperl during your opponent's next turn.

name: Gastly
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Geodude
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Geodude does 50 damage to itself.

name: Grimer
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Grimer and put it onto Grimer. (This counts as evolving Grimer.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Growlithe
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Lileep
Attack1Text: If Lileep has any React Energy cards attached to it, remove 2 damage counters from Lileep.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Machop
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Magby
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Magmar from your hand onto Magby (this counts as evolving Magby) and remove all damage counters from Magby.
Attack1Text: If Full Flame is in play, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Magnemite
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Omanyte
AbilityText: Damage done to your opponent's Pokemon by your Omanyte, Omastar, Kabuto, Kabutops, or Kabutops ex isn't affected by Resistance.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Seedot
Attack1Text: Search your deck for an Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Sentret
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Skitty
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a React Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Tentacool
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Trapinch
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Voltorb
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Voltorb does 10 damage to itself.

name: Wailmer
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to each Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Wurmple
AbilityText: If Wurmple is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Wurmple is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack1Text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with 1 of the Defending Pokemon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokemon to switch.

name: Wynaut
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Wobbuffet from your hand onto Wynaut (this counts as evolving Wynaut) and remove all damage counters from Wynaut.
Attack1Text: Both Wynaut and the Defending Pokemon are now Confused.
